body: ah i remmeber i why i didnt fav this., cuz he seemed like a control freak and threatned ot break up with her. this author's works are hit or miss

damn @8e7a20633eb24d3 i actually felt that

so true
words of wisdom spoken 2 years ago indeed

this could've been better. honestly at the beginning when he threatened to break up with her, it really turned me off.  She's sitting there with the vibe between her legs doing this for you and then you go and threaten to break up with her because she complains a little about it? No bueno. That's what we in the S&M business call a "Hard Limit" no relationship should hinge on whether or not your partner follows your every whim and demand, that isn't a relationship.
